name: Europe to Singapore and back in a day!
description:
In October 2012 I embarked on a trip in order to fly on my first Airbus A380. This would involve flying from Paris to Singapore, spending only a couple of hours on the ground before returning to Paris on the same aircraft I flew out on!  

In order to do this I first had to get to Paris, so flew to Milan, Italy, on to Rome, and finally on to Paris, returning from Paris to Manchester on the way back.  My entire journey took a little over 48 hours from leaving home to arriving back in Manchester.

Here is that journey condensed into 5 minutes.

Flight schedule:
20/10/2012 07:15-10:30 MAN-MXP FlyBE BE7354 E195
20/10/2012 15:15-16:30 MXP-FCO Alitalia AZ1027 E175
20/10/2012 18:00-20:10 FCO-CDG Air France AF1905 A320
20/10/2012 23:20-18:15* CDG-SIN Air France AF256 A388
21/10/2012 23:00-06:10* SIN-CDG Air France AF257 A388
22/10/2012 07:45-08:15 CDG-MAN Air France AF1668 A321

My trip report from the weekend is here:
http://www.aviationphotos.co.uk/index.php/trip-reports/312-road-to-singapore-a380-to-singapore-for-100

✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y

✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈✈
